GPIO_FxnTable_s Struct Reference
GPIO Driver » GPIO Driver API

The definition of a GPIO function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific GPIO driver implementation. More...

#include <GPIO.h>

GPIO_toggleFxn toggleFxn
 

Detailed Description

The definition of a GPIO function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific GPIO driver implementation.

Field Documentation

GPIO_clearIntFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::clearIntFxn

Function to clear a GPIO pin interrupt flag

GPIO_disableIntFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::disableIntFxn

Function to disable a GPIO pin interrupt flag

GPIO_enableIntFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::enableIntFxn

Function to enable a GPIO pin interrupt flag

GPIO_InitFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::initFxn

Function to initialize the given data object

GPIO_ReadFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::readFxn

Function to read from the specified peripheral

GPIO_setCallbackFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::setCallbackFxn

Function to bind a callback function to a GPIO pin interrupt

GPIO_setConfigFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::setConfigFxn

Function to configure the gpio pin

GPIO_toggleFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::toggleFxn

Function to toggles the current state of a GPIO

GPIO_WriteFxn GPIO_FxnTable_s::writeFxn

Function to write from the specified peripheral
